text: Jan Marie Joseph Verstraeten (16 May 1757 â€“ 21 February 1838) was a Dutch rentier and politician from Boekhoute, that was at the time of his birth a city within Habsburg Netherlands (now Belgium). In the United Kingdom of the Netherlands he served for East Flanders as a member of the 1815 Assemblee of notables from to and as a member of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands from 1815 to 1818. Verstraeten died in Boekhoute on 21 February 1838, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1757 births Category:1838 deaths Category:Dutch mayors Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands
title: Jan Marie Joseph Verstraeten
